segments.text: I glance into this cozy kitchen and see a woman busily drying a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron and a simple dress, looking completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink is right there beside her, with water running steadily from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh my goodness, the basin is overflowing!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the edge in a big sheet, splashing onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got one foot in the puddle already, but she doesn't seem to notice at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, there's a boy climbing on a little stool in front of the open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar with one hand and holding a plate with the other.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A girl is standing nearby, her arm up as if she's waiting for a cookie from him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the window above the sink, I can see a nice garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's so calm out there, totally different from the chaos building inside.
segments.speaker: PAR
